mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Wells, Cornelius E.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Pleasants Co., VA [Pleasants County, West Virginia]
St. Marys VA [St. Marys, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Wells, Cornelius E. Patient Age: 33. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of left hand. Ball entered palm side half inch above the metacarpal phalangeal articulations of the middle ring and little fingers. Exit at the articulation of [illegible] the ligaments of joints. With fracture of metacarpal bones of fingers. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/13. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wells, Cornelius E.

Gun shot fracture of left hand. Ball entered palm side half inch above the metacarpal phalangeal articulations of the middle ring and little fingers. Exit at the articulation of [illegible] the ligaments of joints. With fracture of metacarpal bones of fingers
